improvedConfiguration_tier2.script:
ImprovedConfiguration 50 0.5 0.35 0.5 0.35
miscAttrs/repairSpeedFactor mul 1.25 1.35
miscAttrs/ammoBayHealthFactor mul 2.0 2.5
miscAttrs/fuelTankHealthFactor mul 2.0 2.5
miscAttrs/engineHealthFactor mul 2.0 2.5
miscAttrs/fireStartingChanceFactor mul 0.5 0.35

improvedConfiguration_tier1.script:

miscAttrs/repairSpeedFactor mul 1.25 1.35

miscAttrs/engineHealthFactor mul 2.0 2.5
miscAttrs/fireStartingChanceFactor mul 0.5 0.35

antifragmentationLining_tier4.script:

miscAttrs/antifragmentationLiningFactor mul 1.5 1.6
miscAttrs/crewChanceToHitFactor mul 0.5 0.4
miscAttrs/stunResistanceDuration add 0.1 0.15
miscAttrs/repeatedStunDurationFactor mul 0.8 0.75

extraHealthReserve_tier3.script:

miscAttrs/healthFactor mul 1.08 1.1
miscAttrs/chassisHealthFactor mul 1.5 1.65

miscAttrs/chassisRepairSpeedFactor mul 1.15 1.2

miscAttrs/enginePowerFactor mul 1.075 1.1

miscAttrs/backwardMaxSpeedKMHTerm add 2 3
